EUROPE

EEA REGULATORY MATTERS AND ENQUIRIES

DSA Point of Contact for Member States’ authorities, the European Commission and the European Board for Digital Services (Article 11 DSA)

Pursuant to Article 11 of the Digital Services Act (DSA), Verisign Inc. has designated Simmons & Simmons LLP in the Netherlands to serve as the single point of contact on behalf of Verisign, Inc. and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for all communications by EU Member States’ competent authorities, the European Commission, and the European Board for Digital Services in relation to the DSA.

Simmons & Simmons LLP may be contacted for matters pertaining to Article 11 of the DSA in English or Dutch as follows:

Simmons & Simmons LLP

Attn: Verisign DSA Representation Team

PO Box 79023

1070 NB Amsterdam

The Netherlands

Phone: +31207222500

E-mail: verisign-dsa-authority@simmons-simmons.com

DSA Point of Contact for Recipients of Services (Article 12 DSA)

Verisign Inc. has designated Simmons & Simmons LLP in the Netherlands as the single point of contact on behalf of Verisign, Inc. and its wholly-owned subsidiaries for communications with recipients of its and their services in the EEA that pertain to Article 12 of the Digital Services Act (DSA). Please ensure you include your full name and contact details, including your e-mail address in any communication. Simmons & Simmons LLP may be contacted for matters pertaining to Article 12 of the DSA as follows:

Simmons & Simmons LLP

Attn: Verisign DSA Representation Team

PO Box 79023

1070 NB Amsterdam

The Netherlands

E-mail: verisign-dsa-service@simmons-simmons.com

PERMISSIONS
